e1.quote: Great leaders inspire greatness in others.

e2.quote: Belief is not a matter of choice, but of conviction.

e3.quote: Easy is the path to wisdom for those not blinded by ego.

e4.quote: A plan is only as good as those who see it through.

e5.quote: The best confidence builder is experience.

e6.quote: Trust in your friends, and they’ll have reason to trust in you.

e7.quote: You hold onto friends by keeping your heart a little softer than your head.

e8.quote: Heroes are made by the times.

e9.quote: Ignore your instincts at your peril.

e10.quote: Most powerful is he who controls his own power.

e11.quote: The winding path to peace is always a worthy one, regardless of how many turns it takes.

e12.quote: Fail with honor rather than succeed by fraud.

e13.quote: Greed and fear of loss are the roots that lead to the tree of evil.

e14.quote: When surrounded by war, one must eventually choose a side.

e16.quote: Truth enlightens the mind, but won’t always bring happiness to your heart.

e17.quote: Fear is a disease; hope is its only cure.

e18.quote: A single chance is a galaxy of hope.

e19.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

e20.quote: The costs of war can never be truly accounted for.

e21.quote: Compromise is a virtue to be cultivated, not a weakness to be despised.

e22.quote: A secret shared is a trust formed.
